alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 11 at 3:52PM CDT until May 11 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL CRITTENDEN...WESTERN DESOTO...NORTHEASTERN TUNICA AND SOUTHWESTERN SHELBY COUNTIES... At 352 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Walls, or 8 miles southwest of T O Fuller State Park, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Southaven, West Memphis, Horn Lake, Hernando, Marion, T O Fuller State Park, Memphis, Walls, Crawfordsville, Edmondson, Horseshoe Lake, Sunset, Anthonyville, Jericho, Lake Cormorant, Southwest Memphis, Eudora, Whitehaven and Frayser. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
